Table of Contents

Name

qarray_destroy - deallocate a distributed array

Synopsis

#include <qthread/qarray.h>

void
qarray_destroy (qarray *a);

Description

This function deallocates a qarray safely, and updates all internal bookkeeping counters.

See Also

qarray_create(3) , qarray_iter(3) , qarray_shepof(3) , qarray_elem(3)
